reviews.review: This is nice game and cosmetics and costumes are very nice.That thing with competitive play(must to pay) isn't very nice but on casual and another servers it's nice.I saw very good players and very bad.Kids screaming or rage quiting or cry xD.But in some moment it's funny in MVM(Man vs Machine).
Nie polecam , za bardzo upodobniacie te gre do CS : GO

Great game but can get very repetitive after playing for a few days. This game is kinda a joke and has really made me laugh about some good times in my life. It also can cause you to get really angry if you take the game serious and always like to win. There are a cluster of cheaters but it's not that big of a deal because most take this game as a joke. You have several classes to choose from and two teams "Blue" "Red". Which has a really complex and interesting plot of how this became a thing and what caused it.
Außer dass die Community manchmal ein bischen Fremdscham verursacht alles gut auch nach den ganzen Jahren

This game is great and I think you should try it to. <-- I wrote this review at 68.7 hours of play time.
Now I have a lot of hours over 1000 in fact. And this game is still just phenomenal the game play is fun the characters are great and gun play and mechanics are fun. Hop in with some friends and have loads of fun! Or play by your self and make your own fun.Nominate this NOW

For people who have steam and want to play a game without spending money then Team Fortress 2 is just the game for you. This free to play game is the better then the other free to play games because the game has a load of features thaet aren't in any other free to play games.

I believe that the fact that I have 1200 hours in this game and have wasted about $300 in it has set my opinion to be that I like this game. It can be chaos and that is what i like about it. It's taunts and community can generate some crazy monents.

2017年9月9日重新写一遍—————————————————————————————————
玩的最长的游戏，太毒了...游戏的画风清奇（划掉），人物表情等细节到位，虽然发布于2007而且还被G胖削弱过画面，今天看来还是很不错。画面暂且不讲，游戏的平衡性极佳，没有氪金的概念，商店里卖67的帽子市场里2块钱都买得到..
最重要的是！这是我玩过氛围最好的游戏了！！！游戏氛围友好，（Frindly  heavy)有好几次都是两个人打到残血，突然一起跳舞,有一次两队只顾着跳舞车都不管了..
———————————————————————————————————————————
游戏的平衡性很强，对新手玩家比较友好。
Ps:我超级喜欢这个画风！！！！！
这个游戏对于免费游戏来说实在是太良心了！建模很精致（该圆就○，这是很难得的。。。）
我是分割线——————————————————————
从几天前用窗口模式玩了一遍之后玩tf2极卡...玩别的都没事，电脑配置：内存8G GTX960,I7,输入法是自带的英语（以前用搜狗输入法玩都不卡233），删除下载，改画面后还是卡...

O jogo é muito bom, mas está estragado. Não consigo mais jogar o jogo com jogadores reais, só entro em partidas com snipers bots. Dá um jeito nisso valve, delete os bots do jogo, o problema persiste desde 2020 e vocês ainda não resolveram??? O que esses funcionários da Valve ficam fazendo?
Good free to play game. It's fun.

说几点
优点：
1.首先，游戏武器的平衡性是我见过的游戏中最好的，这游戏有时靠技术有时靠运气。
2.你有事没事还可以听见老外聊天。
3.可以通过成就获得武器，而且有些成就非常简单！
4.太多想说说不完了，看缺点吧。
缺点：
1.画面是Q版的，所以不是真实的，不过看个性。
2.mmp，看什么缺点，快下载！
